scripts.backend:start: echo "starting backend..." && cd mh3-backend && sh mvnw spring-boot:run
scripts.backend:build: echo "building backend..." && cd mh3-backend && sh mvnw clean package
scripts.frontend:start: echo "starting frontend..." && cd mh3-frontend && npm start
scripts.frontend:build-dev: echo "building frontend..." && cd mh3-frontend && rm -rf dist && npm run build:dev
scripts.frontend:build-prod: echo "building frontend..." && cd mh3-frontend && rm -rf dist && npm run build:prod
scripts.localdb:up: echo "docker compose UP..." && docker compose up -d
scripts.localdb:down: echo "docker compose DOWN..." && docker compose down
scripts.devstage:up: echo "docker compose UP..." && cd stages/dev/ && docker compose up -d --build
scripts.devstage:down: echo "docker compose DOWN..." && cd stages/dev/ && docker compose down
